channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8310922] java/lang/Class/forName/ForNameNames.java fails after being added by JDK-8310242
item.description:
The following test fails in the JDK22 CI:

java/lang/Class/forName/ForNameNames.java

Here's a snippet from the log file:

item.summary: java/lang/Class/forName/ForNameNames.java fails after being added by JDK-8310242

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
